keep_paid_numbers.description:
Whether or not to keep phone numbers when switching to a support license.

Note: Phone numbers require additional number licenses under a support license.

license_type.description:
The type of license to assign to the new operator if a license is required.
(`agents` or `lite_support_agents`). Defaults to `agents`

role.description: The role the user should assume.

skill_level.description: Skill level of the operator. Integer value in range 1 - 100. Default 100.
